name: Complete 6 different Break the Targets stages
Beat Very Easy (5 Stock)
Get a KO (in 1P Game) with the HomeRunBat
Get the No Damage Bonus
Defeat Link (in 1P Game) using only Pika Down B
Win a 1 v 3 against Level 9 CPUs
Get the Hawk Bonus
Beat Both Bonus Games w/ Falcon
Get the Mew Catch Bonus
Beat Normal (3 Stock)
Get a KO (in 1P Game) with the MotionSensorBomb
Break Fox's Reflector
Beat Very Hard (1 Stock) w/ No Continues
Beat Break the Targets w/ Samus, Falcon, and Jigglypuff
Get the Pacifist Bonus
Beat Very Hard (1 Stock)
Complete 6 different Board the Platforms stages
Get the Mystic or Comet Mystic Bonus
Defeat Samus (in 1P Game) using only Ness Up B
Catch a Beedrill or Chancey (in 1P Game)
Get the Cheap Shot Bonus
Get a KO (in 1P Game) with the StarRod
Spike an opponent through the acid on Planet Zebes
Beat Very Easy (5 Stock) w/ Link, Yoshi, and Jigglypuff
Get the Special Move Bonus
